alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Clay; Foard; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 8:46PM CST until February 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Ice accumulations near one quarter to one half inch across southeastern Oklahoma. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, northern, northwest, southeast, southern and southwest Oklahoma and northern Texas. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 6 PM CST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Significant travel problems expected. A few power outages are expected, especially across southeastern Oklahoma. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia in a short amount of time if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. In Oklahoma, call 8 4 4 4 6 5 4 9 9 7 for road information. In Texas, call 8 0 0 4 5 2 9 2 9 2 for road information.

area.areaDesc: Archer; Baylor; Clay; Foard; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger
